Barcelona: A City of Art and Architecture

Marvel at Gaudis masterpieces like the Sagrada Familia and Park Guell. Wander through the Gothic Quarter, savor tapas at bustling markets, and soak in the Mediterranean vibes. Barcelona is a city full of life and color.
